TextLibrary.Text: I still think this is disgusting, but here you are Drong. Here's an Ogre for you to eat.

Ooohhh... you are Drong's very good friend for life. Yum yum yum. Drong have hanky for you.

That's not a hanky, Drong, it's a very rare Earthblood Cloak.

Drong not care for magic stuff, he use it for blowing nose. Yours now. Might need washing though. Drong see you later.
